name: EpicGameTitle
description:
This game is a about a girl who decided to explore around just because she felt like it. She eventually found herself in a bizarre place populated with just snails and chickens, but they are really weird snails and chickens that defy the laws of physics with their weird snail and chicken-y powers. Take control of the girl and guide her to the finish!

Creators:

Jessie Lam - Programmer (not really)/ Chicken animator/sort -of-artist

Bryan Quach - Programmer/Level Designer

Brian Tu - Programmer

Music Used (Royalty Free):
Superepic
Aurea Carmina

Assets Used From: VGDC Scaffold Unity Platformer
